Others: Dalton Knecht made his first NBA start for the Los Angeles Lakers against the Memphis Grizzlies.
Knecht struggled in his first start, scoring only 3 points on 1-7 shooting from the field, including 1-7 from three-point range.
Knecht lost minutes to Cam Reddish in the second half and exited the game with a jaw injury.
The Lakers lost the game to the Grizzlies, dropping to 4-4 on the season and 1-4 on their five-game road trip.
